name: Lezzoo
headline: Lezzoo is an on-demand delivery Superapp for Iraq.

founders.name: Yadgar Merani, Founder
founders.description: I'm a Kurdish Iraqi, born in London and moved to Iraq at age 3. My journey in the startup world began in Iraq, where I founded a startup that was the first in the country to receive support from Y Combinator. Passionate about innovation and startups, I'm dedicated to making a positive impact through my work

generated_description:
Lezzoo is a pioneering on-demand delivery super app based in Erbil, Iraq, and it's here to revolutionize how people get their goods and services. Founded in 2018 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W19, Lezzoo has quickly become a heavyweight in Iraq's digital marketplace.

At its core, Lezzoo aims to make life easier, delivering everything from food to groceries and household services directly to your doorstep with just a few taps on your device. The motto is simple: "We deliver happiness to your doorstep." This isn’t just a flashy slogan; it reflects Lezzoo's commitment to customer satisfaction, evidenced by a noteworthy 4.8-star rating from users.

With a robust team of around 190 employees, Lezzoo is powered by a diverse workforce dedicated to enhancing the user experience. Their services include food delivery, grocery shopping, pharmacy needs, e-commerce, and even courier services for faster delivery options. They've thought through the convenience factor, offering multiple subscription plans, like the Lezzoo VIP, which provides perks such as free deliveries and exclusive discounts.

Lezzoo sets itself apart in the market by being a one-stop-shop. It's not just about delivering food; it's about fostering a community that connects consumers, merchants, and riders in an efficient ecosystem. If you're a merchant, they promise to help grow your business by tapping into Lezzoo's extensive user network.

Their emphasis on innovation, creativity, and top-notch customer support reflects a deep understanding of the local market and consumer needs. Plus, with Michael Seibel from Y Combinator backing them, they’re poised for future growth and increased visibility.

In a world where convenience is key, Lezzoo isn't just another delivery service—it's a lifestyle enhancement for the people of Iraq. If you're in the region, checking out Lezzoo could save you time and add a bit of joy to your daily routine. You can find out more and explore their offerings at [lezzoo.com](https://lezzoo.com).
